1.title: El que no coge consejos, no llega a viejo.
1.plot: Ilia just wants to pass out when she returns home from her studies Europe. But her family has other plans for her, including a surprise party and meddling in her personal life every chance they get.

2.title: No es lo mismo pelar el plátano, que comerse la alcapurria.
2.plot: Ilia goes to a surreal job interview, where the interviewer is more interested in hot Spaniard guys than Ilia's skills for the job.

3.title: Predicando la moral en calzoncillos (Preach)
3.plot: Ilia makes a feminist speech before her blind date arrives. When he turns out to be more open minded than Ilia, she starts to question her double morality.

4.title: Los trapos sucios se lavan en casa.
4.plot: Ilia goes to a doctor's appointment and experiences the uncomfortable situation of having her life discussed by everyone in the waiting room.

5.title: Con la boca es un mamey.
5.plot: Ilia tells Sandra that she might want a serious relationship with someone and that she will be completely honest about that person from the beginning. She does the contrary when she meets Eduardo a few seconds later.

6.title: Sarna con gusto no pica. Parte 1
6.plot: Ilia and her friends get together to drink Yuyo, a drink they invented, and go through all the drunk phases together.

7.title: Sarna con gusto no pica. Parte 2
7.plot: At the lowest point in their drunk night Ilia and her friends get into a big fight as a result of Gabriel's new girlfriend, Claudia, asking too many questions.

8.title: El que nace pa' vellón, nunca llega a ser peseta
8.plot: Ilia is put to the test by a film producer who will give her a writing job for his next feature film if she gets along with his niece, little devil Larita.

9.title: Eso pasa en la mejores familias.
9.plot: Ilia and Eduardo have their first official date. Even though Ilia can't stop blabbering about her feelings and has a wardrobe malfunction, they end up having sex. The next morning she sends a text with graphic details of her night with Eduardo to her family chat, thinking it was Sandra's chat.

10.title: Lo que no pasa en 100 años, pasa en un día.
10.plot: Ilia's trivial problems are put into perspective when her friends and her sister encounter life threatening situations.

11.title: A la larga todo se sabe
11.plot: Ilia thinks Eduardo is about to ask her to be his girlfriend, but she discovers the ironic truth during a bar fight.

12.title: A mal tiempo, buena cara.
12.plot: Ilia deals with the fact that she has no boyfriend or carrier, and that she has to work as a server in her sister's restaurant. A surreal situation with a client results in Ilia having a nervous breakdown that is interrupted by two lost tourists.

13.title: Si no es Juan, es Pedro.
13.plot: Ilia confronts Javier, the guy who's girlfriend Eduardo was dating at the same time as Ilia. The honest moments they're having keep on being interrupted by a bar drunk and his inappropriate sexual songs.

imdb.plot outline: Ilia has returned from her graduate studies in Europe to her hometown in the heart of the Puerto Rican mountains: Jayuya. She encounters absurd and bizarre situations with her friends, family, work and romantic life that would only happen in a small rural town.
imdb.title: Ilia
plot: _Ilia_ (qv) has returned from her graduate studies in Europe to her hometown in the heart of the Puerto Rican mountains: Jayuya. She encounters absurd and bizarre situations with her friends, family, work and romantic life that would only happen in a small rural town.::Juliana Maité
